short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension for Universal Compact View

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Utilise Bynder DAM from anywhere in your Chrome Browser.

Streamline workflows by accessing your Bynder DAM portal online and use assets across email solutions, web-based applications, CMS, CRM, and any other system of your tech stack.

View, select. search, filter assets and use Dynamic Asset Transformation to digitally transform your assets directly on your Chrome Browser through Bynderâ€™s pre-built Universal Compact View.
